snippet.description:
* BMW C1 \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMW_C1‎
* Cached * Similar
Wikipedia
Loading...
The BMW C1 is an enclosed scooter manufactured by Bertone for BMW. It was described by at least one publication as a feet-forward machine.
‎Models and options - ‎History - ‎C1-E electric version - ‎See also
